Agentforce Commerce (formerly Commerce Cloud)

Turn every conversation into a conversion.

Agentforce Commerce connects your entire business on one unified platform from ecommerce and POS to order management. Its all powered by Agentforce, our trusted AI that proactively helps your teams with merchandising and your customers with guided shopping.

Watch Demo See what's new

Connect in-store and online with Unified Commerce.

B2C Commerce

From discovery to checkout, B2C Commerce is where customer expectations meet AI-powered business growth. See more revenue, productivity, and trusted success at scale.

Find out more

Order Management

Process orders seamlessly, wherever customers transact. Agent actions, real-time omni-channel inventory, and automated order routing reduce costs and increase revenue.

Find out more

Modern Point of Sale

Bring customer, order, and inventory data to your shop floor with a flexible, mobile-first POS. Move faster with built-in Salesforce integrations and no-code CMS.

Find out more

Scale, simplify, and grow with connected B2B.

B2B Commerce

Make buying more personal and selling more efficient with AI tools. Connect your business on a unified platform that helps you build trust and meet complex needs.

Find out more

Order Management for B2B

Split large-volume orders into multiple shipments and speeds. Work smarter and simplify cross-channel order management with a single code-base and AI-first experience.

Find out more

Revenue Lifecycle Management

Automate revenue operations while delivering seamless buying and selling experiences anywhere customers transact. Close deals fast with guided quoting and AI.

Find out more

Get faster time to value and lower TCO.

Composable Commerce

Realise ROI faster with a composable commerce platform. Enable more innovation with flexible, trusted storefronts for headless commerce.

Find out more

Payments

Increase conversions with an optimised, flexible checkout experience while cutting out complex integrations. Configure secure payments anywhere on our platform.

Find out more

Salesforce Commerce FAQs

Commerce Cloud is the best ecommerce platform for customer companies. Automate sales across the entire customer lifecycle by embedding AI-driven commerce everywhere from flexible digital storefronts to embedded apps for sales, service, and marketing.

Commerce Cloud helps you manage your digital commerce business and grow your sales. Whether you have a B2B, B2C, or D2C ecommerce business, Commerce Cloud has the tools you need to succeed.

Commerce Clouds ecommerce software offers features like headless commerce, composable commerce, order management, and payments. You can also integrate Commerce Cloud with your CRM software to track customer data and personalise their shopping experience.

Commerce Cloud is the ultimate ecommerce platform.

Commerce Cloud helps brands launch sooner, grow faster and reach more customers. Leveraging the power of the cloud, our trusted technology will help you craft innovative customer experiences that drive higher conversions and average order value (AOV), productivity and inspire brand loyalty. With artificial intelligence infused into the platform, we enable 1-to-1 personalisation without the need for data scientists. Our robust technology partner ecosystem and our team of industry experts ensure your growth from planning to launch and beyond.

Salesforce Commerce Cloud includes a suite of products designed to unify the customer experience across all channels. This typically encompasses B2B Commerce, B2C Commerce, and Salesforce Order Management, all built on the Salesforce platform to provide a single view of the customer and seamless integration with Sales, Service, and Marketing clouds.

In 2016 Salesforce completed the acquisition of Demandware which is now a part of Commerce Cloud.

An ecommerce platform will help you seamlessly launch and grow your digital business through a prebuilt infrastructure. This allows you to reach new customers, reduce operational costs, and grow sales with scalable tools for your online business.

Todays connected customer has high expectations. They interact with retail brands through many touchpoints web, mobile, social, marketplaces, store, ads, and connected devices and they want to buy in the moment, at any of these touchpoints. They expect each interaction to run smoothly, and for all interactions to be coordinated into a single, unified experience. Ecommerce software will help you transform your business so you can seamlessly manage online purchases, transactions, inventory, customer data, and create a seamless digital experience for customers.

When choosing the right ecommerce software prioritise a future-proof platform that is trusted, scalable and readily supports international expansion enabling future growth. Look for a solution architected for flexibility with all the purpose-built tools you need to deliver innovation quickly. It is important to consider the total cost of ownership of any ecommerce solution including ability to integrate with other digital and third-party solutions, uptime, access to advanced features, ongoing support and implementation.
